mentions.candidate: Since I was first elected, I have helped over 16,000 local residents, and have spoken in Parliament over 700 times on your behalf.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Locally, this election is a straight fight between me and the Conservative candidate.

issues.brexitEurope: I am a prominent campaigner against a hard Brexit and am pleased to have been endorsed at this election by our local Lambeth for Europe group.
issues.education: Our local NHS, schools and other public services have had their budgets cut by the Conservatives and the Liberal Democrats in government since 2010.
issues.lawCrime: I initiated and led the first ever full House of Commons debate on how we address youth violence in our area.
issues.transport: Persistently demanding ministers act against Southern Rail for their appalling train services.

community.content: I became the first MP for our area to establish an office in the heart of the constituency to serve local people.

politicalExperience.achievements: First MP for our area to grow up and go to school here.

endorsements.endorsement: Endorsed by our local Lambeth for Europe group.

quotes.text: I have helped over 16,000 local residents, and have spoken in Parliament over 700 times on your behalf.

examples: I have helped over 16,000 local residents.
Have spoken in Parliament over 700 times on your behalf.
Our local NHS, schools and other public services have had their budgets cut.
This election is about who you want to represent our area in Parliament.
I have a strong record of delivery for our area.
First ever full House of Commons debate on how we address youth violence in our area.
Persistently demanding ministers act against Southern Rail for their appalling train services.
I am a prominent campaigner against a hard Brexit.

personalStories.story: First MP for our area to grow up and go to school here.

examples: Endorsed by our local Lambeth for Europe group.
Locally, this election is a straight fight between me and the Conservative candidate.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: First MP for our area to grow up and go to school here.

examples: First MP for our area to grow up and go to school here.
